title: Research a Specific Stock
description: An advisor asks for a summary report on a specific company before recommending it to a client.

tasks.description: Retrieve the latest stock quote, market cap, and key financial ratios for the requested company.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls the current market data for the stock.

tasks.description: Pull the latest analyst ratings and price targets from third-party research providers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers consensus analyst ratings for the stock.

tasks.description: Summarize the findings in a concise report for the advisor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear, one-page summary of the company's financial health and market sentiment.
